meanings.definition: The sport or practice of pitting gamecocks to fight.
meanings.sent1: Cockfighting is illegal in many countries due to animal cruelty concerns.
meanings.sent2: People used to gather in the village square to watch cockfighting matches.
meanings.sent3: At the county fair, they replaced the usual pig race with a cockfighting event.
meanings.sent4: In some cultures, cockfighting is seen as a symbol of bravery and strength.
meanings.sent5: The noise and excitement of cockfighting filled the arena with tension and anticipation.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in or attending cockfights.
meanings.sent1: Cockfighting enthusiasts often travel long distances to witness their favorite matches.
meanings.sent2: The police raided the illegal cockfighting ring and arrested several participants.
meanings.sent3: When the mayor accidentally stumbled into the cockfighting pit, everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The political debate turned into a verbal cockfighting match between the candidates.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of the cockfighting crowd was palpable as the roosters entered the ring.
